Youtie Herbert C. et John G. Winter, Michigan Papyri. Volume VIII. Papyri and Ostraca from Karanis. Second Series. (University of Michigan Studies. Humanistic Series. L.)
Ann Arbor, The University of Michigan Press - London, G. Cumberlege - Oxford, Oxford University Press, 1951, 4°, xxii-266 pp. et 11 pll.
P. Mich. VIII, 464-541 [by J.G.W. and H.C.Y.]; - O. Mich. III, 972-1111 [by H.C.Y.].

C.R. par H.I. Bell, CR N.S., 2 (1952) pp. 185-186. - G.W. Bond, JHS 73 (1953) p. 165. - Lionel Casson, AJP 74 (1953) pp. 217-219. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 23 (1954) pp. 95-96. - Alfred Ernout, RPhil 3e s., 26 (1952) pp. 68-69. - Marcel Hombert, ChrEg 27 (1952) No. 53, pp. 295-301; - Latomus 11 (1952) pp. 89-91. - Naphtali Lewis, CP 48 (1953) pp. 53-55. - V.B. Schuman, CJ 48 (1953) p. 235. - E.R. Smothers, Traditio 7 (1949-1951) pp. 473-476. - E.G. Turner, JRS 42 (1952) pp. 133-134. - C.B. Welles, AJA 57 (1953) pp. 302-305. - Hans Julius Wolff, Iura 3 (1952) pp. 374-376. - Friedrich Zucker, DLZ 74 (1953) coll. 339-342.
